<COOLEDNODES><INFO sitename="Everything2" site="http://everything2.com" servertime="Mon Feb 4 01:35:11 2013">Rendered by the Cool Nodes XML Ticker</INFO> <cooled cooledby_user="per ou" node_id="1181985" parent_e2node="1181962" author_user="humanasset">Send him to Detroit!</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="tanktop" node_id="2100672" parent_e2node="312079" author_user="drownzsurf">Raffinose</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="avalyn" node_id="2051906" parent_e2node="1900390" author_user="Tem42">tl;dr</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="Pandeism Fish" node_id="2100680" parent_e2node="2100636" author_user="Auspice">February 2, 2013</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="StuartO)))" node_id="1348555" parent_e2node="23456" author_user="Frankie">South Africa</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="dannye" node_id="2100673" parent_e2node="2007960" author_user="avalyn">I:Scintilla</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="moeyz" node_id="1996421" parent_e2node="1530028" author_user="raincomplex">sunset rainwater turns her sidewalk chalk-art into a sherbert delight; a surprise gift from chaos that tumbles her like tinkling bells onto the wet grass</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="drownzsurf" node_id="2098523" parent_e2node="2100558" author_user="Mister Chu">Writing (how to)</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="drownzsurf" node_id="2048549" parent_e2node="2048550" author_user="ScarletCoffee">Dear PETA</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="shaogo" node_id="2100590" parent_e2node="1513257" author_user="Sol Invictus">caesaropapism</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="Hazelnut" node_id="512120" parent_e2node="512118" author_user="burnboy">Don't stop. You can sleep when you're dead.</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="dichotomyboi" node_id="1831623" parent_e2node="1799672" author_user="izubachi">There Goes the Neighborhood! 2: Unfinished Business</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="Noung" node_id="1784222" parent_e2node="1247029" author_user="Jack">The Wire</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="Tem42" node_id="1745431" parent_e2node="95309" author_user="althorrat">I, Robot</cooled> <cooled cooledby_user="Tem42" node_id="1521221" parent_e2node="122627" author_user="althorrat">The Caves of Steel</cooled>
